resources.string: No workouts found! Please navigate to the "Create Workout" tab in the navigation pane to get started!
You have a workout currently being created. If you quit now, all progress will be lost! Are you sure you wish to quit?
You have a workout currently being edited. If you quit now, all progress will be lost! Are you sure you wish to quit?
Are you sure you wish to reset the statistics for this workout? Doing so will reset any the times completed and the percentage of exercises completed.
Provides a button next to each exercise in the current workout that when clicked launches a video using the provided URL for the specific exercise.
Converts all units in the app from imperial units (lbs) to metric units (kg).
Provides a simple timer at the bottom of the current workout tab.
Do you wish to reset this workout? If so, you will be taken back to the first day of the workout with all exercises reset.
Are you sure you wish to delete this workout? If so, all statistics for it will also be deleted.
Are you sure you wish to delete this exercise? All data regarding this exercise will be deleted. Note that deleting it will remove it from already made workouts.

LiteWeight is an open source lightweight workout manager that allows for multiple workouts to be created and managed.

Default exercises are provided by the developer, and if desired you can add your own custom exercises to be used in any workout! All exercises can have a URL associated with it should you wish to be able to view a video on how to perform it while working out. You can also specify the most recent amount of weight for specific exercises and this weight will carry over all your workouts.

All data is saved locally on your phone in a database, and in the future functionality for cloud storage may become available.

Current Workout: Your currently selected workout. You can mark an exercise as done, update the weight of an exercise, or watch the video associated with it if you have that option enabled. 

My Exercises: Exercises, both custom and default, are listed in this section, and the weights and URL associated with the exercises can be modified. 

My Workouts: Where all of your created workouts are located. The workout at the top is the currently selected one. To switch the current workout, you can select any of your workouts that appear in the list. You can delete the current workout or edit it to add or remove specific workouts. (Note you cannot add or remove entire days from a workout). You can also reset any statistics associated with the current workout.

Create Workout: Here you can create a workout with a unique name and a set length.

Settings: This section allows for any user settings to be enabled or disabled. These changes will persist upon the closing of the app.
App Logo was created by Monkik. \n\nMy Exercise Icon was created by Demograph.
